attributes.action: Overturn Nicky Morgan's forcing through of Amanda Spielman's Ofsted appointment
attributes.additional_details:
BBC article detailing MP's concerns here

Nicky Morgan to force through choice of new Ofsted chief
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-36737123
attributes.background: Amanda Spielman's appointment as head of Ofsted was rejected by a commons select committee who interviewed her. They had grave concerns over her lack of teaching experience & understanding of the safeguarding responsibilities of the role. Nicky Morgan is ignoring this & forcing her through. Stop her
